block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is the Space Shuttle aka Orbiter design by Toshikazu Kawasaki. The orbiter was one of my favorite space craft growing up. I've actually seen and touch the orbiter on the NASA Kennedy Launch site . When I saw this model, I really wanted to learn how to fold it and share with you on YouTube. Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
